definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse
Indonesia (abbr. for 印度尼西亞|印度尼西亚)
Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
München or Munich, capital of Bavaria, Germany
Sydney, capital of New South Wales, Australia
Cheney (name)/Richard B. "Dick" Cheney (1941-), US Republican politician, vice-president 2001-2008
Disney (company name, surname)/Walt Disney (1901-1966), American animator and film producer

sentences.english: Now those that sealed were, Nehemiah, the Tirshatha, the son of Hachaliah, and Zidkijah.
sentences.chinese: 签名的是哈迦利亚的儿子省长尼希米和西底家。

sentences.english: In that year, the Council of Nicaea was convened by emperor Constantine.
sentences.chinese: 在那些年里，康斯坦丁大帝组建了尼西亚理事会。

sentences.english: I think Josh is probably a better perimeter shooter and rebounder than Ronny.
sentences.chinese: 我认为约什在投篮和抢篮板球能力上比罗尼更好些。

sentences.english: Chesney and Sugarland capped Country Thunder 2007 before a large audience.
sentences.chinese: 切斯尼和糖城封顶大量观众前国家雷霆2007。

sentences.english: In the garden he was already accepting this load.
sentences.chinese: 在客西马尼园中，他已经预备好领受这一切。

sentences.english: One morning, several weeks later, Professor Baglioni visited Giovanni.
sentences.chinese: 几周后的一个早晨，柏格罗尼教授来看望乔凡尼。

sentences.english: Bulgaria has abandoned plans to build a new nuclear power station at Belene.
sentences.chinese: 保加利亚放弃了在贝勒尼新建一座核电站的计划。

sentences.english: Mr. Tilney was no fonder of the play than the pump-room.
sentences.chinese: 蒂尔尼先生看戏的兴趣，并不比去矿泉厅的兴趣大。

sentences.english: Eleanor invites Catherine to visit the Tilney home in Northanger Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 埃莉诺请凯瑟琳蒂尔尼访问家中诺桑觉寺。

sentences.english: Programmer Paul Newell is responsible for building the rigs to McNally's specifications.
sentences.chinese: 程序员保罗尼维尔负责麦克纳利的特效编写程序。

sentences.english: These drow Nisstyre was quietly seeking out.
sentences.chinese: 尼赛迪尔正在悄悄地寻找这些卓尔。

sentences.english: Nisar says there were very limited investment avenues for Muslims.
sentences.chinese: 尼萨尔说，穆斯林的投资渠道非常有限。

sentences.english: Very little is known about Chouchani, including his real name.
sentences.chinese: 很少人了解乔查尼先生，包括他的真实姓名。

sentences.english: After more than two years of wandering, Eugene returned to Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 叶甫盖尼经过两年多的漫游以后又回到了莫斯科。

sentences.english: We can play with the dominoes Dominique.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以一起玩多米尼骨牌了。

sentences.english: He had come from Gascony and was going to Paris to see the King.
sentences.chinese: 达德尼昂来自加斯科尼，正前往巴黎晋见国王。

definition: woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

(old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
to blacken/abbr. for 涅槃[nie4 pan2]
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux
